title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 02 March 2017 - XWiki
content:

11:23 <KermitTheFragger> has joined #xwiki  
11:25 <vmassol> tmortagne: Hi. I need your help on an EM question I have  
11:25 <vmassol> on the main wiki of xwiki.org I see that the Nested Pages Migrator extension pages are installed (it shows in the app index)  
11:25 <vmassol> when I go to EM it says it's not installed  
11:25 <vmassol> (doesn't show up)  
11:25 <vmassol> but when I ssh to node1 or node2, I see it's there in extensions  
11:26 <vmassol> and in the logs I don't see any error about it  
11:26 <vmassol> any idea what could happen?  
11:29 <vmassol> found the reason  
11:29 <vmassol> the directotries in the perm dir are actually empty  
11:29 <vmassol> there are 3 versions in org%2Exwiki%2Econtrib%3Aapplication-nestedpagesmigrator-ui but when I go inside the versions subdirs they're empty  
11:29 <vmassol> so it means someone has remove the extension but without removing the pages, not sure how that's possibe :)  
11:30 <vmassol> so it's a mystery to me...  
11:31 <gopal86> has quit  
11:31 <vmassol> seems it was installed on farm  
11:31 <vmassol> since I can find the pages on all subwikis  
11:31 <vmassol> does uninstall from farm work and remove from all subwikis?  
11:31 <vmassol> (if so I'll reinstall and uninstall)  
11:32 <vmassol> doing that  
11:33 <xwikiorg\_guest\_2> has joined #xwiki  
11:33 <vmassol> sorry about that  
11:36 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki

12:28 <flyingpot> has quit  
12:28 <flyingpot> has joined #xwiki  
12:46 <OSIMasson1> has joined #xwiki  
12:53 <flashdel> has joined #xwiki  
12:54 <flashdel> hi folks, i got a problem: i created a page with () in the name and now i cannot access the page anymore... So i tried to rename it with velocity, but this "$xwiki.getDocument("Marketing.Amazon.Amazon Marketing Services (PPC)").rename("Marketing.Amazon.Test")" doesnt work, what am i doing wrong?  
12:58 <vmassol> flashdel: I'm going out for lunch now  
12:58 <vmassol> quickly: I just tested on xwiki 9.1 and it worked for me  
12:58 <vmassol> I could create a page named "Test (Vincent)"  
12:58 <vmassol> "test (vincent" actually  
12:58 <vmassol> the url I got : http://localhost:8080/xwiki/bin/view/test%20%28vincent%29/  
12:58 <vmassol> bbl  
12:59 <flashdel> mhh ok, thats the url i am getting as well, but i am jumping back to the dashboard.. Just go and have a lunch, maybe you can help me later  
13:28 <vmassol> flashdel: tell me where I should go to see the problem?  
13:41 <acotiuga> has quit  
13:42 <acotiuga> has joined #xwiki  
13:48 <OSIMasson1> has quit  
14:33 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
14:34 <msmeria1> has quit  
14:41 <floflobel> Hi, i need to hide the some node in the default panel "Navigation". I follow the wiki on Document Tree Macro and I have found only example : http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Document+Tree+Macro#HExcludenodesbasedontheirids but it's doesn't work  
14:41 <flashdel> vmassol:  our wiki is running in our private network and unfourtunately i cannot open our wiki for public :-( But i can describe the Problem: I created a space Marketing.Amazon.Amazon Marekting Services (PPC) and if i click on it i am redirected to SpaceDashboardTemplate. I am running on Xwiki 8.0 and i tried to rename the space, but the velocity macro (see above) doesnt work  
14:45 <vmassol> flashdel: can you descirbe what I need to do to reproduce?  
14:46 <prakhar123> has joined #xwiki  
14:46 <vmassol> (precisely)  
14:46 <edvorg> has quit  
14:57 <flashdel> I am using xwiki 8.0 and i made a wiki, named: My Wiki. There i created a space for our marketing department and there another user created a space Amazon, with another space named "Amazon Markerting Services (PPC)" and in that space he created 2 pages and another subspace where 4 pages are in. I got the navigation on the left side where i can see all those spaces and pages (you can expand them there) and i can access all the pages, but if i  
14:57 <flashdel> click on any space, e.g Amazon or Amazon Marketing Services (PPC) i am redirected to the "SpaceDashboardTemplate"  
15:02 <flashdel> vmassol: is this precise enough? :)  
15:03 <vmassol> ok so the issue is with the document tree, testing  
15:04 <vmassol> the problem is that i cannot reproducce  
15:04 <vmassol> maybe you could try with a more recent xwiki version  
15:04 <flyingpot> has quit  
15:05 <vmassol> the latest LTS is 8.4.4 btw and it has a lot of fixes when compared to 8.0  
15:05 <vmassol> the issue doesn't ring a bell to me though  
15:06 <vmassol> in short ( and ) characters are supposed to be supported in page names  
15:06 <flashdel> mhh ok, i will check if i can upgrade  
15:07 <vmassol> ok  
15:08 <vmassol> flashdel: I'll try quickly on a 8.3 version I have locally  
15:11 <flashdel> vmassol: how long will 8.4.4 be supported?  
15:11 <vmassol> ok I cannot reproeuce but I had problems creating a page with ( and ) in 8.3 so maybe there's soething  
15:12 <vmassol> regarding support you have the info here: https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/Support  
15:12 <flashdel> in this case, i will upgrade and see if it helps  
15:12 <vmassol> so the open source project supports  a LTS for 1 year  
15:12 <vmassol> then the LTS becomes the new veresion  
15:12 <vmassol> but if you contract support with a company like XWiki SAS you'll get a support for as long as you need it ;)  
15:13 <vmassol> (for your version)  
15:14 <flashdel> nice to know :)  
15:22 <floflobel> vmassol: Have you got an idea for my lastest post ?  
15:32 <acotiuga> has quit  
16:01 <flyingpot> has joined #xwiki  
16:06 <flyingpot> has quit  
16:08 <flashdel> vmassol: i upgraded to 8.4.4 and now i am seeing a blank page :o  
16:09 <vmassol> flashdel: when you say you click on the left, wdym?  
16:10 <vmassol> can you paste a screenshot maybe?  
16:10 <vmassol> (imgur)  
16:12 <flashdel> http://imgur.com/a/kpk6Y  
16:12 <flashdel> i upgraded and i cannot access anything  
16:14 <flashdel> the tomcat7 log says WARNING: Servlet action is currently unavailable  
16:16 <vmassol> ah ok so it's not problem with ( and )  
16:16 <vmassol> just a problem of your upgrade  
16:16 <flashdel> excatly :S  
16:16 <vmassol> we cannot help you much without your console logs  
16:16 <flashdel> ok, which one do you need?  
16:17 <vmassol> the catalina.out content since you started xwki  
16:18 <flashdel> http://pastebin.com/N1iunytz  
16:18 <flashdel> here you go  
16:21 <vmassol> checking  
16:21 <orogor> hello , my catlina logs barks about INFO  .a.DefaultAuthorizationManager - [admin] access has been denied for user [xwiki:XWiki.zzzzz] on [xwiki]: security checkpoint  
16:21 <orogor> and even superadmin can t display macro and get this error  
16:21 <vmassol> ok so you have some wrong solr config  
16:22 <vmassol> (talking to flashdel  
16:22 <vmassol> )  
16:22 <flashdel> i didnt change anything on it  
16:22 <vmassol> so xwiki init fails  
16:22 <vmassol> flashdel: try this:  
16:22 <vmassol> delete this directory:  
16:22 <orogor> as i understand macro are executed by the macro creator , but here , the superadmin can t manage the wiki , the manage box gives the macro error too  
16:22 <vmassol> /var/lib/xwiki/data/solr  
16:23 <vmassol> the solr schema must have changed so you need to reindex  
16:23 <vmassol> and deleting this dir will do that  
16:23 <vmassol> then restart  
16:23 <flashdel> oh ok  
16:27 <vmassol> zwindler: hi  
16:27 <vmassol> zwindler: you there? :)  
16:28 <flashdel> now it is looking better, but i cannot login, because the Authservice cannot be initialize http://pastebin.com/rg05yvTW  
16:30 <vmassol> you have some errors in your xwiki.Cfg btw for the "plugins" key (some oldish plugins) but that's not going to be an issuee, just some extra errors in the logs  
16:31 <vmassol> I think your LDAP error is because LDAP is no longer undled by default  
16:31 <vmassol> this is most likely mentiopned in the RN somewhere, checking  
16:31 <vmassol> yep here: https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotesXWiki83M1#HIssuesspecifictoXWiki8.3Milestone1  
16:32 <vmassol> tmortagne: how to do this? unconfigure LDAP, install the extension using EM and reconfigure LDAP?  
16:34 <flashdel> that would have been my next question  
16:34 <tmortagne> the right release note is http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/ReleaseNotes/Data/XWiki/8.3/#HLDAPModulemovedtoContrib  
16:34 <tmortagne> "If you don't have any "pure" XWiki admin user to install the extension you can use superadmin user. See documentation."  
16:35 <vmassol> the doc is not clear  
16:35 <vmassol> so the process is: unconfigure LDAP + reconfigure it?  
16:36 <vmassol> unconfigure LDAP, log in with a user in xwiki db superadmin and reconfigure LDAP?  
16:36 <vmassol> s/xwiki db or superadmin  
16:36 <msmeria> has quit  
16:36 <vmassol> flashdel: I don't see any other way  
16:37 <vmassol> so configure xwiki to use its own user db  
16:37 <vmassol> log in with superadmin user (you need to enable it in xwiki.cfg if not done)  
16:37 <vmassol> install the LDAP extension  
16:37 <vmassol> and re-enable LDAP  
16:38 <vmassol> "so configure xwiki to use its own user db" == the default  
16:38 <vmassol> xwiki.authentication.ldap=0 I think  
16:38 <vmassol> and uncomment xwiki.authentication.authclass  
16:39 <vmassol> actually you probably just need that last line  
16:39 <flashdel> thats really uncomfortable :S  
16:39 <vmassol> ie comment out  xwiki.authentication.authclass  
16:39 <vmassol> so that it uses the default  
16:40 <vmassol> which is  
16:40 <vmassol> xwiki.authentication.authclass=com.xpn.xwiki.user.impl.xwiki.XWikiAuthServiceImpl  
16:42 <tmortagne> vmassol: you don't need to unconfigure anything  
16:42 <tmortagne> if the authenticator does not exist it's not going to use it  
16:42 <tmortagne> anyway if you use the old authenticator it's not the right one so you can uncomment it  
16:42 <tmortagne> xwiki.authentication.authclass=com.xpn.xwiki.user.impl.xwiki.XWikiAuthServiceImpl  
16:42 <tmortagne> is the old one  
16:43 <tmortagne> the new authenticator use a new one  
16:43 <tmortagne> the new authenticator use a new one  
16:44 <tmortagne> xwiki.authentication.ldap property does not exist anymore  
16:45 <vmassol> flashdel: so you don'tneed to do anything  
16:45 <vmassol> you just need to log with a user in xwiki  
16:45 <vmassol> (not with a ldap user)  
16:45 <vmassol> and then install the LDAP extension  
16:45 <vmassol> using the Extension Manager  
16:46 <flashdel> the LDAP Authenticator?  
16:46 <tmortagne> most of the time you have a pure XWiki user already (often the one you used to setup your wiki in the first place), superadmin is only when you don't have such a user  
16:46 <flashdel> yeah, i only have superadmin  
16:46 <tmortagne> ok  
16:46 <tmortagne> yes the LDAP Authenticator  
16:46 <tmortagne> if you setup it in xwiki.cfg  
16:47 <tmortagne> the LDAP application is the same as before, some helper to set properties at wiki level  
16:55 <KermitTheFragger> has quit  
16:56 <flashdel> Ok, that did work and now it is looking fine  
16:56 <flashdel> except that the problem which i got a few hours ago still persists vmassol :-(  
16:57 <vmassol> can you tell us where you click to get the problem?  
16:57 <vmassol> (screenshot maybe)  
17:03 <flashdel> i will make a screencapture  
17:07 <flashdel> https://daten.widders.de/s/zoKLWFwSOYhp5nI  
17:07 <flashdel> should be possible to play it directly in the browser  
17:08 <KermitTheFragger> has joined #xwiki  
17:10 <vmassol> flashdel: thanks so it's indeed the navigation panel which uses the doc tree  
17:10 <vmassol> it's a pity I can't see the urls  
17:10 <vmassol> could you paste the url you get when you hover over the link that you clicked  
17:10 <vmassol> ?  
17:15 <flashdel> https://wiki.intern.rheinwerk.de/xwiki/bin/view/Marketing/Amazon/Amazon Marketing Services (PPC)/  ist the link when i hover over it  
17:16 <flashdel> if i copy the url i get https://wiki.intern.rheinwerk.de/xwiki/bin/view/Marketing/Amazon/Amazon%20Marketing%20Services%20%28PPC%29/  
17:17 <flashdel> I got the same effect if i click on https://wiki.intern.rheinwerk.de/xwiki/bin/view/Marketing/Amazon/  
17:17 <vmassol> if you right click on the link and copy it and then open a new browser tab and paste it in the url you get to the right page?  
17:18 <flashdel> no, i always land on that dashboard site  
17:20 <vmassol> ok then you need to check that page in edit mode to see its content  
17:20 <vmassol> because that's your problem I'm sure  
17:20 <vmassol> replace /view/ by /edit/ in the yrl  
17:20 <vmassol> \*url  
17:21 <vmassol> and check the content  
17:21 <flashdel> ah, then i end up on the right page  
17:22 <flashdel> mhh  
17:22 <flashdel> i saved it without changing anything and now it works  
17:23 <vmassol> we need to know the content, there must be some code  
17:23 <vmassol> that does the redirect  
17:23 <vmassol> when you saved your user may not have Programmng Rights and maybe the code is not executing anymore because of that  
17:24 <vmassol> note: I  have to leave in a few minutes  
17:26 <flashdel> the user doesnt have programming rights, thats true  
17:27 <flashdel> but there is no content  
17:27 <flashdel> in one space, which wasnt working properly as well there was just a text "Headline-Search-Kampagnen auf Amazon", thats all  
17:28 <vmassol> any xobjects?  
17:28 <flashdel> how can i find out?  
17:28 <vmassol> edit the page in object mode  
17:28 <flashdel> btw we can discuss this tomorrow if you have to leave  
17:29 <vmassol> I'm going on holidays till Monday so I'll leave you in the hands of the rest of the community ;)  
17:29 <vmassol> I have to go now, good luck  
17:29 <flashdel> ok, i got a workaround so thats fine, have a nice holiday and thanks for the great help!
